metadata.title: CVE-2015-9289 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 4.1.4, a buffer overflow occurs when checkinguserspace params in drivers/media/dvb-frontends/cx24116.c. The maximum sizefor a DiSEqC command is 6, according to the userspace API. However, thecode allows larger values such as 23.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
